replies.body: Did u think that plat is better than Gold? mfw you find out plat is more trash than Gold and is the true elo hell.

> Did u think that plat is better than Gold? mfw you find out plat is more trash than Gold and is the true elo hell.

Not at all.

Ever since Gold 2 I've been matchmade with Plat V's and boy....it makes Silver look good
